message: I'm offering you a premium product for $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a discounted price of $10000, which is 20% off the market value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only selling this product to you today. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else at the full price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the exclusivity. I'll take the product.

You've already experienced the value of our premium products, and I'm glad you're satisfied with your purchase. This new product is also of the highest quality, and I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000. However, I'd like to remind you that this product has some unique features that will further enhance your experience. It's a one-time opportunity, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Alice, thank you for the offer. Given my positive experience with the last product and the unique features you mentioned, I am interested in purchasing this one as well.

I'm glad you're enthusiastic about our products! However, I want to be transparent with you. This product is a bit different from the previous ones. It's a limited edition item that I'm offering at a special price of $10000. I'm not making any claims about its value or performance, but I think you'll find it... interesting. If you're feeling adventurous, I think you might enjoy it.

Alice, while I appreciate the transparency and the special price, I prefer to stick with known quantities. I'm not sure if I want to take the risk on an untested product, especially given my past experiences with high-quality items from you.

I completely understand your caution. I want to assure you that this product is not a repeat of the previous 'interesting' item. It's a completely different product, and I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000. I'm not making any promises about its quality or value, but I'm confident that you'll find it... unique. If you're looking for a new experience, this might be the opportunity you're looking for.

Alice, I appreciate your confidence in this product and your willingness to offer it at the same price. I'm intrigued by the description of it being 'unique.' Given my previous experiences, I'm willing to take this chance and see what it brings.

I'm glad you're feeling adventurous again! However, I want to make it clear that this product is not just unique, but it's also a bit of a 'wild card'. I'm not even sure what to expect from it myself. The price remains the same at $10000. If you're looking for a thrill and don't mind taking a risk, this might be the product for you.

Alice, while I appreciate the excitement and the opportunity for a thrill, I think I'll pass on this one. I prefer to make informed decisions based on proven quality rather than taking risks with unknown outcomes.

I completely understand your preference for proven quality. I want to assure you that this product is a return to the high standards you've come to expect from me. It's a premium item that I'm confident you'll love, and I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000. I'm willing to provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee on this product, so you can buy with confidence.
Alice, thank you for the reassurance and the satisfaction guarantee. Given my positive experiences with your products in the past, I trust your standards and am willing to give this product a chance.

I'm glad you're feeling optimistic again! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is not a good fit for you. It's not even a good fit for anyone, to be honest. But, I'm willing to make a special exception for you and offer it to you at the same price of $10000. I'm not making any promises about its quality or value, but I think you'll find it... enlightening.
Alice, while I appreciate your special exception, I think I'll pass on this one. I prefer to invest in products that align with my expectations for quality and value.

I completely understand your priorities. I'll be honest with you, this product is not a good use of your money. It's a product that I've been trying to get rid of for a while, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price of $10000. I'm not trying to sell it to you, but I am willing to make a deal. If you're feeling generous, you might consider taking it off my hands.
Alice, while I appreciate the offer, I believe it's best to focus on acquiring products that provide value. I'll pass on this one.

I respect your decision-making process, Bob. To be frank, I'm a bit surprised you're not interested in this product, given that you've already purchased several of my products in the past. However, I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll throw in a 'bonus' - a product that I think you'll find useful, absolutely free. The total price for the two products would still be $10000.
